zhonglin http://hmybmny.com 2017-01-23T11:04:20-08:00 hmybmny@gmail.com Build a EMR spark cluster with deep learning packages http://forgebach.github.io/2017/01/Spark-Tensorflow-AWS-EMR-Notebook/ 2017-01-17T00:00:00-08:00 zhonglin http://forgebach.github.io/2017/01/Spark-Tensorflow-AWS-EMR-Notebook The need of spark tensorflow/theano integrations has been satisfied in many ways. With AWS EMR boostrap commands, we can simply spin up our own spark cluster with EMR.

prerequisites

  • AWS account
  • EMR security group with inbound settings for jupyter notebook

Reference:
  • Run Jupyter Notebook and JupyterHub on Amazon EMR [link] (https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/big-data/running-jupyter-notebook-and-jupyterhub-on-amazon-emr/)
